sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ag-grid-vue
      style="width: 100%; height: 100%"
      class="ag-theme-alpine"
      :defaultColDef="defaultColDef"
      :columnDefs="columnDefs"
      :rowData="gridData"
  >
  </ag-grid-vue>
</template>

<script>
import "ag-grid-community/styles/ag-grid.css";
import "ag-grid-community/styles/ag-theme-alpine.css";
import { AgGridVue } from "ag-grid-vue3";
import infoCellRenderer from './infoCellRenderer';

export default {
  props: ['gridData'],
  name: "App",
  components: {
    AgGridVue,
    infoCellRenderer
  },
  setup() {
    return {
      columnDefs: [
        { headerName: "Детализация", field: "name", cellRenderer: "infoCellRenderer", width: 140},
        { headerName: "ФИО", field: "name", width: 280, filter: true, floatingFilter: true,},
        { headerName: "Должность/Место работы", field: "infoWorkPlaces", width: 280, filter: true, floatingFilter: true,},
        { headerName: "Ставка", field: "stake",  editable: true, width: 115},
        { headerName: "Часы на ставку", field: "hoursOnStake", editable: true, width: 140},
        { headerName: "Кол-во часов на часовую оплату", field: "hours", width: 160},
        {
          headerName: 'Бюджет',
          children: [
            { headerName: "Планируемое кол-во часов", field: "bHoursPlaned", width: 140},
            { headerName: "Фактическое кол-во часов", field: "bHoursReal", editable: true, width: 140},
            { headerName: "Разница", field: "bHoursDiff", width: 140},
          ],
        },
        {
          headerName: 'Контракт',
          children: [
            {headerName: "Планируемое кол-во часов", field: "cHoursPlaned", width: 140},
            {headerName: "Фактическое кол-во часов", field: "cHoursReal", width: 140},
            {headerName: "Разница", field: "cHoursDiff", width: 140},
          ],
        },
        {
          headerName: 'Общее',
          children: [
            {headerName: "Планируемое кол-во часов", field: "hoursPlaned", width: 140},
            {headerName: "Фактическое кол-во часов", field: "hoursReal", width: 140},
            {headerName: "Разница", field: "hoursDiff", width: 140},
          ],
        },
        { headerName: "Год", field: "year", width: 140, filter: true, floatingFilter: true,},
      ],
      defaultColDef: {
        sortable: true,
        resizable: true,
        spanHeaderHeight: true,
        wrapHeaderText: true,
        minWidth: 100,
        wrapText: true,
        autoHeight: true,
        autoHeaderHeight: true,
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style>
.ag-theme-alpine {
  --ag-header-foreground-color: white;
  --ag-header-background-color: #4B79BB;
  --ag-header-cell-hover-background-color: #355787;
  --ag-header-cell-moving-background-color: #355787;
}
.ag-theme-alpine .ag-header-group-cell {
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 18px;
}
.ag-theme-alpine .ag-header-group-cell-label{
  justify-content: center;
}
.ag-theme-alpine .ag-header-cell {
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 14px;
}

.ag-input-field-input{
  color: black !important;
}

.ag-cell {
  page-break-inside: avoid !important;
}

</style>
